text:
Kyra Petrovskaya Wayne (December 31, 1918 – June 3, 2018) was a Russian-born American author. She was a sniper during World War II and a survivor of the Siege of Leningrad. She was the author of 14 books. She was a survivor of the Siege of Leningrad.
Wayne died in Kingston, Washington of respiratory failure on June 3, 2018 at the age of 99.
